snippet: South Africa will miss AB de Villiers following his decision to opt out of test cricket this year but their ranks have been bolstered by the return of Morne Morkel and Vernon Philander for the three-match series against New Zealand....

headline.main: South African Attack Bolstered Ahead of NZ Tests
headline.print_headline: South African Attack Bolstered Ahead of NZ Tests

lead_paragraph: South Africa will miss AB de Villiers following his decision to opt out of test cricket this year but their ranks have been bolstered by the return of Morne Morkel and Vernon Philander for the three-match series against New Zealand.
